tool_description:
Build Automotive Solutions of Tomorrow.

Use our robust vehicle data APIs to create innovative applications for companies & consumers.
Our Restful APIs integrate smoothly into any system software, website, application or tools
name: vehicle database
title: vehicle database

api_list.name: VIN OCR
api_list.description: This API endpoint reads a VIN number from the VIN sticker, dashboard, vehicle documents or any image. It will take an image as an input and returns the VIN number.

api_list.name: Vehicle Recall
api_list.description:
Our Recalls API provides details on all the open recalls of any vehicle, including the date of issue, the identification number of the recall, the remedy to the issue, and more.

Coverage: This API supports VIN from year 1952 to 2023.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vehicle-database.p.rapidapi.com/recall-check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vehicle-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vehicle-database.p.rapidapi.com/recall-check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vehicle-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: License Plate OCR
api_list.description:
For USA: This API endpoint returns the license plate number and state from the license plate image.

For UK: This API endpoint returns the license plate number the license plate image.
